initial_greeting: Hey hey, glad to see another rodent mask at this party.
talked_already: Can't say I wanted to see you again.

start.text: Though, I can't say I'd want to spend my time talking to a man about politics on a night like this.

choices.text: Politics, Shmolitics. You know what I'm here for...
I'm just interested in getting to know everyone. Tell me about yourself.
You seen anyone suspicious around tonight?

talked_previously.text: Any chance we can hurry up with this conversation?

choices.text: I was hoping we'd talk about more than just politics...
How's your luck been so far with you know who?
Have you talked to The Frog at all?
Are you sure there isn't anyone suspicious around?

talk_of_babes_begins.text: Glad to see someone finally noticed all the hot meat here. I was worried I would have to take all the ladies home with me tonight. Got any preferences?

choices.text: Oh, no, I'm actually here for the politics. Sorry, I can see how that was confusing.

gushing_over_the_hare.text: Haha! I knew I liked you. But I've got first take on her. I've been keeping my eyes on her. She's been with The Fox all night. Don't worry, once I win my prize, I'll let you have a turn.

preferred_any_other_woman.text: Heh, well they're somethin alright, but they don't hold a candle to The Hare. I'm just waiting for my chance alone with her, but she's been talking to The Fox all night. If they talk any longer I might just have to invite them both!

preferred_men.text: What? Wait, are you trying to come on to me? That's sick man, get out of here.

simplify_babe_talk.text: Ahh, yea, no luck yet. That damn Hare's been playin hard to get, any chance I get she goes running over to talk to The Fox. She's knows she can't resist me all night.

this_guy_doesnt_like_gay_men_because_of_.text: I don't waste my time with people like you.

quick_annoyed_explanation.text: Ladies love me. I love the ladies. I'm a win win.

not_based_jack_rabbit_response.text: Pfft, what else would they be good for? It's starting to sound like you're swinging for the wrong team. Stop wasting my time and leave me be.

sus_talk_begins.text: Buddy, the only one who's suspicious is you. You wouldn't catch me talking to some grease pigs when we're surrounded by class A cattle.

already_asked_about_sus_jack_rabbit.text: Didn't you hear me the first time? I haven't seen anyone, other than that fine Hare. I'd love to talk to her more but The Fox just hasn't left her side. Now excuse me while I try and schmooze my way onto her good side.

frog_dissing.text: That slimy creature told me off for catching a peek on The Hare. He just couldn't keep his mouth shut. If I ever saw him out of here I'd teach him a thing or two.

choices.text: I know who he really is...
Sounds like you're the slimy creature here.

jr_called_slimy_creature.text: Heh, and you had just started to grow on me. Lets see how far protecting these ladies will get you in life. Get out of here.

player_disses_frog.text: Tell me about it. I don't have time to waste on creatures like him.

frog_diss_gambit_accepted.text: HA! He really should be wearing a weasel mask. I heard he betrayed our current mayor. Not that it affects me. Just shows you a persons true colors. Thanks for the heads up, I'll keep far from him now.

frog_diss_declined.text: Eh, what can you do. As long as The Hare sticks around this party, that Frog can't bother me.

politics_bait.text: What? Man, why would you... get out of here.
